name: Countdown2Eternity
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: countdown two eternity
des:
“Countdown 2 Eternity” is a weekly radio ministry featuring well known author and apologist Don Stewart, and pastor James Kaddis of Calvary Chapel Signal Hill. Together they examine current events, and connect what’s going on in our world to Bible prophecy.

Once enabled, you can listen to the most recent episode by saying, "Alexa, play Countdown 2 Eternity"

To pause or resume any episode, say "Alexa, pause" or "Alexa, resume." To listen to previous episodes, say "Alexa, play the previous episode." If you want to know the title of an episode while the episode is playing, say "Alexa, ask Countdown 2 Eternity for the title of this episode." If you want to know the air date of an episode, say "Alexa, ask Countdown 2 Eternity for the date of this episode."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
